sentence: And a career break, with full attendance bonus and year-end bonus, missing a day means losing a hundred million yuan. 一点都不带夸张的。 Not exaggerating at all. 作为一名有觉悟、有理想、有抱负的职场牛马，在经历了四号客户的闪婚后，他就有了居安思危的危机意识。 As a conscious, idealistic, and ambitious workplace bull, after the flash marriage of client No.4, he developed a sense of crisis. 舔狗这种职业，失业是说来就来。 Being a bootlicker, unemployment can come any time. 人无远虑，必有近忧。 A lack of foresight spells trouble down the road. 五号客户两个月前就和一个小鲜肉隐婚了，我该怎么办？ Client No.5 secretly married a young hunk two months ago, What should I do?
source: Unclear, could be from a business or motivational article focused on career and work-life balance.
